product_name: The North Face Free Thinker Shell Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Free Thinker jacket boasts rugged construction and tough Gore-Tex(R) Pro protection to withstand demanding use and keep you comfortable on big mountains and steep descents. Gore-Tex(R) Pro 3-layer construction delivers excellent waterproof, windproof and highly breathable protection to keep you dry and comfortable, even in harsh conditions. Embedded RECCO(R) reflector enhances radio signals from search-and-rescue RECCO detectors, helping speed up the search for a buried avalanche victim. One chest pocket features a water-resistant, insulated cell phone sleeve; other chest pocket has an elastic loop to keep a radio secure and easily accessible. Additional pockets: flap-covered zip handwarmer pockets, wrist pocket (with goggles cloth), internal goggles pocket and internal stash pocket. Center YKK Aquaguard Vislon zipper boasts a new tooth design that's integrated with a polyurethane-laminated tape for excellent weather resistance. Powder skirt helps seal out cold air and snow entry; clip-in tabs let you connect the powder skirt to compatible pants (sold separately) for an integrated, protective barrier. Pit-zip vents let you dump excess heat and provide cooling ventilation; double flap guards resist the elements for enhanced protection. Adjustable hood is compatible with your helmet and offers excellent peripheral vision. The North Face Free Thinker jacket has a drawcord hem and rip-and-stick cuffs to help retain warmth; cuffs have thumbholes to help keep cuffs in place.
